summary: 100 Yen is a historical documentary about the evolution of arcades and the culture surrounding it - from the birth of arcades to the game centers that still thrive today.
cast: Brian Ashcraft|Daigo Umehara|Aaron Chmielowiec|Mike Ross|Justin Wong|Gama no Abura|Eric Chung|Clover-Tac|Joey Cuellar|Ebihara|Paul England|Ryan Gutierrez|Ryan Hart|Ryan Harvey|Kenryo Hayashi|Hiroaki Inaba|Kiyoshi Ishikawa|Fumihiro Ishiwata|Mark Julio|Hiro Kawagchi|Seth Killian|Mike Kozlowski|Yuko Kusachi|Christopher Laporte|Miu|Tomoyuki Mori|Yasuyuki Nakane|Tez Okano|Barret Trickey
title: 100 Yen: The Japanese Arcade Experience
